page.title: 13RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES
page.content: {Outdoor Facilities. { }The outdoor facilities in Pencaitland consist of 2 parks,a bowling green and a garage.One park has a football pitch and a good football team.The bowling green is just next to the park and is in constant use during the summer.The garage is just across the road from The Cross.It has a shop as part of it. { Indoor Facilities.} The school,Trevelyan Hall,2 shops,sub post office,bowling club,recording studio and 2 pubs are the indoor facilities in Pencaitland.The school has other things going on inside it out of school time such as Brownies,Guides and Cubs.In the Trevelyan Hall throughout the year there are discos,parties and there is a flower show once a year.The recording studio
